PathAssistant.masterLabel: AH Project Backlog CBS Project Phase

pathAssistantSteps.info:
At this stage, the Solution Design needs to be completed and approved before development work begins.


Approval Status should be "Solution Design Approved" before proceeding with Development.

Before we can close the project, confirm we have the following attached:

  • Business Requirements
  • Solution Design
  • Tech Design (if applicable)
  • Support Handoff


When Closing the project, make sure the Status is set to "Completed" and enter the Date the project was Completed.

To submit your project for Approval, ensure you the following:

  • Solution Design is attached via the Quip tab
  • Requirements Received Date is populated.
  • Populate the Project Contact field (required due to Approval Process setup)
